title: Vain Facade (playtesting)
author: Tonitrus
description: Playtesting mod for Vain Facade custom expansion.
Burgess - A police detective trying to do his job in the hectic world of heroes and villains.
Hero: Sphere - A narcissistic anti-hero with the ability to generate different types of forcefields.
Environment: The Midnight Bazaar - A goblin market style deck full of fae that will eagerly deal with the heroes or the villains. Buyer beware.
Villain: The Baroness - A vampire with centuries of experience defeating foes via physical strength and magic (difficulty 4 - intended to be very difficult but engaging and hard to predict)
credits: HEROES
